description: Describes an endpoint authorization for authorizing Redshift-managed VPC endpoint access to a cluster across AWS accounts.

Grantor.description: The AWS account ID of the cluster owner.

Grantee.description: The AWS account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

AuthorizeTime.description: The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.

Status.description: The status of the authorization action.

AllowedAllVPCs.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

AllowedVPCs.description: The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.

EndpointCount.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.

Account.description: The target AWS account ID to grant or revoke access for.

VpcIds.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant or revoke access to.

Force.description: Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted.
